original_text: The two men covered Jesus' dead body with these spices. And they tied long pieces of linen cloth around it many times. That is how the Jewish people prepare a dead body before they bury it.
korean_text: 이에 예수의 시체를 가져다가 유대인의 장례 법대로 그 향품과 함께 세마포로 쌌더라

sentences.original_text: The two men covered Jesus' dead body
And they tied long pieces of linen cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 긴 린네 천 조각들을 묶었고

sentences.original_text: That is how the Jewish people prepare
a dead body before they bury it.
